action.action-desc: Mr. Sherman (for himself, Ms. Brownley, Ms. Budzinski, Mrs. Cherfilus-McCormick, Mr. Cohen, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. Gomez, Mr. Lynch, Mr. Magaziner, Mr. McGarvey, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Moulton, Mr. Nadler, Ms. Norton, Mr. Panetta, and Mr. Peters) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Education and Workforce

form.official-title: To repeal the authority under the National Labor Relations Act for States to enact laws prohibiting agreements requiring membership in a labor organization as a condition of employment, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Nationwide Right to Unionize Act.
Subsection (b) of section 14 of the National Labor Relations Act (29 U.S.C. 164) is repealed.
